====================================
PYLACEWING - LACEWING PYTHON LIBRARY
====================================
http://code.google.com/p/pylacewing/

What is 'pylacewing'?
---------------------
pylacewing is a set of modules for use with the Twisted framework so
you can communicate with the Lacewing protocol.
It works very well with games because of the lightweight protocol.

How do I install pylacewing?
----------------------------
Do the usual "python setup.py install" :-)

How do I use pylacewing?
------------------------
Wiki:
http://code.google.com/p/pylacewing/w/list

API reference:
http://mp2.dk/pylacewing/docs
